About Me

BIO

Hello, I'm MikaÃ«l a Mechanical Engineer specialized in structural calculation, retrained into Web Developer and Data Scientist.

Safran Aero-Systems (aeronautic sector)

Mechanical Engineer (Crash simulation)
02/2019 to 08/2019 - 6 months -

The aim was to study the crash of a civil helicopter tank with simulation (Finite Element Method). The mission was to realize a benchmark between two mechanical crash simulation methods: ALE vs SPH and to decide which one was the most suitable for this type of crash. The validation criteria were strain, Von Mises stress and internal pressure.

Safran Aero-Boosters (aeronautic sector)

Programmer (Python)
01/2020 - 1 month -

My mission was to develop a Python tool. This tool should extract big data from a simulated fan blade loss of a reactor. This data will allow the design office to better size mechanical parts. For this, I highly used pandas library for reading, and the programm created excel files with all the data well organized inside.

Web Development Bootcamp (Zero to Mastery Academy)

Web Developer
02/2020 to today - 6 months -

After my mission at Safran Aero-Booster, I found programming field very exciting. So I decided to retrain into a Web Developer, by following an online Bootcamp to become a Full Stack Developer and done many projects using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap 4, jQuery, Node.js, React, PostgreSQL etc.
